Title: Increases the monetary penalties for violations of law relating to the care of animals by pet dealers
Summary: Makes violations of law relating to the care of animals by pet dealers a misdemeanor.
LawCode: Amd ยง406, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to increasing the monetary penalties for violations of provisions of law relating to the care of animals by pet dealers
